attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Site Must Be Shut Down.
Its Claims To Be A Peaceful Christain Organisation.
Its Makes Statements That God Hates Retards.
This Is A Very Seriuos Thing To Put On A Website And This Isnt The Only Thing One The Site.
I Beg and Urge You To Have This Site Shut Down.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
